data.Name: Florence + the Machine - Dance Fever Tour
data.Description: One dollar from every ticket sold will benefit Choose Love to aid refugees worldwide. Choose Love does whatever it takes to provide refugees and displaced people with everything from lifesaving rescue boats to food and legal advice. Their work has reached over 1.8 million people and supported over 250 fast-acting community organizations across Europe, the Middle East and along the US-Mexico border. Everything they do is powered by a vision of a world that chooses love and justice every day, for everyone.
